content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Obama makes to achieve his purpose of praising and memorializing Nelson Mandela.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Obama makes to achieve his purpose of praising and memorializing Nelson Mandela.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
